QuestData.Title: Demon Souls
QuestData.Description:
I need to extract information about the Burning Legion from these foul creatures. But living, the demons are almost impossible to break.
However, like you, I wield a powerful artifact -- the Scythe of Souls.
Take one of my soul gems. If you place it next to a demon's corpse, it will rip the 'soul' out. Then, we will see if the scythe can get them to talk.
QuestData.LogDescription: Trap $1oa demon souls on the Faronaar Front.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes. Already, I can tell their souls are weaker than their flesh.
